cab.content: it \It.)r Military Secret.7123(FVo?7i Viceroy, Army Department, 21st March 1918.5662. Mari situation. Mari raiding gangs have looted villages towards Sibi and in Thai valley. Pathan tribes appear unaffected and Bugtis still holding aloof. Practically whole of Daki force now concentrated Gumbaz and part Dera Ghazi Khan force reached Rakhrii on 17th without opposition. Duki force expected to force Watwangi Pass on 21st, aud Dera Ghazi Khan force to attack Barkhan same day.
